title: ChromeLens
creator: Nishita Wojnar
description: ChromeLens is a set of developer tools that allow developers to code websites better suited for the visually impaired.  The three tools that are currently available are:  Filters to experience a website;  Scanners to audit;  Trackers to visually show the path
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
